sentence.text: Crush the amaretti biscuits or almond macaroons with a rolling pin and mix with the ricotta cheese , chopped apricots , Sweetex Granulated , Cointreau or Grand Mariner and ground cinnamon .
Finely crush the biscuits .
The leather chafed her heels and the straps felt as if they were going to crush her bones .
Of a sudden Lexandro 's free hand gripped Valence 's wrist with a power which would have crushed any ordinary bones .
Kersey crushed out the stub of his cigarette .
I crushed some of the flowers and rubbed them on my forehead as I 'm told it has an invigorating effect on cabbages and thought it might do the same for me .
Jack plucked the flower out of his morning coat and closed his fist slowly over it , crushing it into a pulp .
The lorries came and went on a service road near the town ; on some days the bulldozer clanked back and forth , crushing the rubbish into the soft , orange earth .
Crush them to a powder and boil them , then soak the ankle when the water 's cooled enough to bear .
They knew that anything , even Alice , could advance over them like bulldozers , crush them to bits .
He spoiled twice as much fruit as he ate by crushing the berries beneath his clumsy feet in a mad rush from bush to bush .
Children can either take remedies as a powder by crushing the pill between two clean teaspoons , or dissolved in a little clean , fresh water in a glass .
She took two pills from a bottle by the bed on which she had thrown herself and crushed them between the pages of Mansfield Park .
A farmer is using a shire horse to pull the millstone which crushes the fruit .
Fresh or frozen prawns and cockles are good -- even prawns in their shells , which are crushed by the throat teeth and provide roughage .
The noise of splintering wood became more commonplace than the singing of birds as saplings and lesser trees were crushed beneath the weight of falling forest giants .
The kitchen window was still open and I climbed in after crushing another handful of lavender with the intention of taking it to bed with me for an invigorating sleep , if such a thing is possible .
Crush biscuits by placing in a strong polythene bag and crushing with a rolling pin or process until fine in food processor .
She looked across the stream , through the leaves at the distant field ; at the nettles and the meadow-sweet and the wild roses ; down at the camomile daisies crushed under her feet .
Dante 's sinners are buried in mud , shut up in the trunks of trees , frozen solid in blocks of ice , crushed beneath stones .
The Mickey Mouse girl would be sweeping it all into the bin , along with any cockroaches she 'd crushed underfoot .
I tried to crush up a salt tablet in a cup and dissolve it in the water but she moaned when I held the cup to her lips and tried to turn her head away .
